PersonalWodList.emptyDescription: Scan your first WOD to get started!

CommunityWodList.joinDescription: Create a free account to view, share, and get inspired by WODs from the entire community.
CommunityWodList.errorDescription: Could not load community WODs. Please try again later.
CommunityWodList.emptyCommunityTitle: Be the first to share one!

WelcomeEmptyState.title: Welcome to WODBurner!
WelcomeEmptyState.subtitle: Log your first WOD in 3 seconds:
WelcomeEmptyState.scanButton: Scan a WOD from a photo
WelcomeEmptyState.communityLink: Or, explore the {community} to see what others are burning today.

WodCard.sharedToastDescription: Your WOD is now visible to the community.
WodCard.unsharedToastDescription: Your WOD has been removed from the community.
WodCard.shareErrorToastDescription: Could not update the share status.
WodCard.deleteDialogDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your WOD{isShared, select, true { and remove it from the community} other {}}.
WodCard.deleteToastDescription: Your WOD has been successfully removed.

accessRestricted.title: Access Restricted
accessRestricted.description: Please sign up or log in to view community WODs and use the timer.

FileUploader.dragAndDropPrompt: Drag & drop your WOD image, or click to select
FileUploader.analyzingDescription: The AI is warming up. This might take a moment.
FileUploader.analysisFailedDescription: The WOD image could not be analyzed. Please try again.
FileUploader.duplicateDialogDescription: This workout seems identical to a WOD you've already saved.
FileUploader.duplicateDialogQuestion: Do you want to save this new one anyway?
FileUploader.saveFailedDescription: An error occurred while saving the WOD.
FileUploader.wodSavedDescription: Your new WOD has been added to your dashboard.
FileUploader.shareAnonymousHelp: Sign up for an account to share your WODs with the community.

LoginPage.confirmEmailDescription: To complete sign-in on this device, please provide the email address where you received the link.
LoginPage.featureTitle: Take it to the next level.
LoginPage.featureDescription: Create a free account to unlock all features and never lose a WOD again.
LoginPage.featureManualDescription: Add your own WODs without needing a photo.
LoginPage.featureHistoryDescription: Save and find all your workouts at any time.
LoginPage.featureTrackingDescription: Analyze your progress and visualize your performance.
LoginPage.formDescription: Enter your email to receive a secure sign-in link. No password required.
LoginPage.emailSentDescription: A link to sign in has been sent to {email}.
LoginPage.sendLinkError: We couldn't send the link. Please try again.
LoginPage.linkSentToastDescription: Check your inbox for a sign-in link. If you do not see it, please check your spam folder.
LoginPage.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
LoginPage.invalidLinkError: The sign-in link is invalid, has expired, or the email is incorrect. Please request a new one.

PremiumPage.title: Premium
PremiumPage.headerDescription: Become a WODBurner Premium member to get unlimited access to all features and support the app's development.
PremiumPage.offer: LIFETIME LAUNCH OFFER for the first 300 members!

toasts.welcomeDescription: Your Supporter badge is now active.
toasts.cancelDescription: You can try again whenever you're ready.
toasts.loginRequiredDescription: Create an account to upgrade to Premium.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: These actions are permanent and cannot be undone.
dangerZone.dialogDescription: This action is irreversible. It will permanently delete your account and erase all of your data, including all your saved WODs, from our servers.
dangerZone.helpText: If you delete your account, all your data will be lost forever.

toasts.deleteError: Could not delete account. User or Firebase services are not available.
toasts.deleteSuccessDescription: Your account and all your data have been successfully deleted.
toasts.deleteFailedDescription: An error occurred. Please try again.
toasts.deleteFailedRecentLogin: This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Please sign in again before retrying.

duplicateDialog.title: Duplicate WOD Detected
duplicateDialog.description: This workout seems identical to a WOD you've already saved.
duplicateDialog.question: Do you want to save this new one anyway?

toasts.saveSuccessDescription: Your new WOD has been added to your dashboard.
toasts.saveFailedDescription: An error occurred while saving the WOD.

toasts.updateFailedDescription: An error occurred while saving your changes.

forTime.title: For Time
forTime.description: A simple stopwatch to time your workout. Optionally set a time cap.

amrap.title: AMRAP Timer
amrap.description: Set a duration and see how many rounds or reps you can complete.

emom.title: EMOM Timer
emom.description: Every Minute On the Minute. Set the interval and number of rounds.

tabata.title: Tabata Timer
tabata.description: High-intensity intervals of 20s work, 10s rest. Customize the rounds.

TimersPage.title: Smart Timers
TimersPage.forTimeDescription: A simple stopwatch to time your workout.
TimersPage.amrapDescription: As Many Rounds/Reps As Possible in a set time.
TimersPage.emomDescription: Every Minute On the Minute, for a set number of minutes.
TimersPage.footer: Or, select a WOD from the dashboard to launch a pre-configured timer.

HeroWodsPage.title: Hero WODs
HeroWodsPage.description: "Hero" WODs are special workouts in CrossFit dedicated to men and women who have given their lives in the line of duty. They are an opportunity to reflect and honor their sacrifice.

premiumUpsell.title: Unlock the Full Arsenal
premiumUpsell.description: Go Premium to access the complete library of over {totalWodCount}+ Hero and Benchmark WODs, including {premiumWodCount} exclusive workouts.

HallOfFamePage.title: Hall of Fame
HallOfFamePage.cardDescription: Free for life. A permanent spot for our earliest supporters.
HallOfFamePage.spotsFull: The list is now closed forever.
HallOfFamePage.emptyList: Be the first to claim a spot!

shareModal.title: WOD Result: {wodName}
shareModal.description: Your final time was {finalTime}. This card is ready for sharing.

GenerateWodPage.title: AI WOD Generator
GenerateWodPage.cardDescription: Feeling uninspired? Let our AI Coach generate a unique and challenging workout for you.

freePlanAlert.title: Free Plan
freePlanAlert.description: You have a limited number of daily generations. {link} for unlimited access.

generatingState.title: Generating your WOD...
generatingState.description: The AI Coach is warming up. This might take a moment.

errorAlert.title: Generation Failed
errorAlert.description: The AI coach is resting. Please try again in a moment.

result.title: Your Generated WOD
result.savedMessage: This WOD has been automatically saved to your dashboard.
